pkgmetadata.longdescription: Codex is OpenAI's advanced AI-powered code generation and completion tool. It leverages large language models to understand natural language prompts and generate corresponding code snippets, functions, and entire programs. Codex supports multiple programming languages and helps developers write code faster, debug more efficiently, and explore new coding patterns.
Codex 是 OpenAI 开发的先进 AI 驱动代码生成和补全工具。它利用大型语言模型理解自然 语言提示，并生成相应的代码片段、函数和完整程序。Codex 支持多种编程语言，帮助开发人员 更快地编写代码、更高效地调试，并探索新的编码模式。
